TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable SoundPlayer extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class SoundPlayer Inherits Component Implements ISerializable
type SoundPlayer = class inherit Component interface ISerializable

summary.span: 控制 .wav 檔音效的播放。

span.span: Controls playback of a sound from a .wav file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別提供簡單的介面，來載入及播放.wav 檔案。The class provides a simple interface for loading and playing a .wav file. 類別支援的檔案路徑，URL 中，從載入.wav 檔包含.wav 檔或包含.wav 檔的內嵌的資源。The class supports loading a .wav file from a file path, a URL, a that contains a .wav file, or an embedded resource that contains a .wav file. 若要播放音效 using類別中，設定.wav 檔案，並在其中一個 play 方法的呼叫路徑。To play a sound using the class, configure a with a path to the .wav file and call one of the play methods. 您可以識別.wav 檔，使用其中一個建構函式，或藉由設定其中一個播放或屬性。You can identify the .wav file to play by using one of the constructors or by setting either the or property. 檔案可以先載入才能播放使用其中一種載入方法，或者可以延後載入，直到其中一個 play 方法呼叫。The file can be loaded prior to playing by using one of the load methods, or loading can be deferred until one of the play methods is called. A設定為載入.wav 檔從或 URL 必須載入.wav 檔的記憶體之前開始播放。A configured to load a .wav file from a or URL must load the .wav file into memory before playback begins. 您可以載入或播放.wav 檔案，以同步或非同步。You can load or play a .wav file synchronously or asynchronously. 如果您呼叫同步載入，或播放方法，呼叫執行緒會等候直到方法傳回時，可能會導致中斷的繪製和其他事件。If you call a synchronous load or play method, the calling thread will wait until the method returns, which may cause painting and other events to be interrupted. 呼叫非同步載入或 play 方法可讓呼叫執行緒能夠繼續使用不中斷。Calling an asynchronous load or play method will allow the calling thread to continue without interruption. 如需有關非同步方法呼叫的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 在背景執行作業](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md)。For more information on asynchronous method calls, see [How to: Run an Operation in the Background](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-run-an-operation-in-the-background.md). 當完成載入.wav 檔，便會產生事件。When a has finished loading a .wav file, it raises the event. 您可以檢查在事件處理常式來判斷是否載入成功或失敗。You can examine the in your event handler to determine if the load succeeded or failed. 音效來源設定為新的檔案路徑或 URL 時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the audio source is set to a new file path or URL. 音效來源設定為新時，會引發事件。The event is raised when the audio source is set to a new . 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [SoundPlayer 類別概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/soundplayer-class-overview.md)。For more information about , see [SoundPlayer Class Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/soundplayer-class-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 類別不能播放其他檔案類型，例如.wma 或.mp3。The class cannot play other file types, such as .wma or .mp3. 如果您想要播放其他檔案類型，您可以使用 Windows Media Player 控制項。If you want to play other file types, you can use the Windows Media Player control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [.NET Framework 解決方案中使用 Windows Media Player 控制項](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267)並[Windows Media Player 物件模型參考 Visual Basic.NET 和 C#](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269)在 Windows Media Player SDK.For more information, see [Using the Windows Media Player Control in a .NET Framework Solution](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131267) and [Windows Media Player Object Model Reference for Visual Basic .NET and C#](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=131269) in the Windows Media Player SDK. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用播放.wav 檔案從本機路徑或統一資源識別元 (URI) 的類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class for playing .wav files from a local path or a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI). [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將字串傳遞至`soundLocation`參數可以是檔案路徑或.wav 檔案的 URL。The string passed to the `soundLocation` parameter can be either a file path or a URL to a .wav file. 如果路徑或 URL 不是有效的仍會在負載的建構，但後續呼叫或 play 方法將會失敗。If the path or URL is not valid, the will still be constructed, but subsequent calls to a load or play method will fail.

SoundPlayer Class Overview (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Load() cil managed

summary.span: 同步載入音效。

span.span: Loads a sound synchronously.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用目前的執行緒來載入.wav 檔案，以防該執行緒處理其他訊息，直到載入完成為止。The method uses the current thread to load a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete. > [!CAUTION] > 方法可能會載入大型.wav 檔案時產生延遲。The method may produce a delay while loading a large .wav file. 此外，繪製和其他事件會被封鎖，直到載入完成。In addition, painting and other events will be blocked until the load is completed. 使用以非同步方式載入音效的方法可讓呼叫執行緒能夠繼續使用不中斷。Use the method to load a sound asynchronously, which allows the calling thread to continue without interruption. 這個方法會引發完成載入時的事件，即使負載不成功。This method raises the event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以將.wav 檔附加至執行個體類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to attach a .wav file to an instance of the class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#2)]

exception.span: 載入時耗用的時間超過了 所指定的時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

exception.span: 找不到 指定的檔案。

SoundPlayer Class Overview (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadAsync() cil managed

summary.span: 使用新的執行緒，從資料流或 Web 資源載入 .wav 檔。

span.span: Loads a .wav file from a stream or a Web resource using a new thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果設定為載入.wav 檔從或 Web 資源，這個方法會從使用新執行緒的位置載入.wav 檔。If a is configured to load a .wav file from a or Web resource, this method begins loading a .wav file from the location using a new thread. 這個方法會引發完成載入時的事件，即使負載不成功。This method raises the event when loading completes, even if the load was not successful. 如果設定從本機檔案路徑載入.wav 檔，這個方法不會執行任何動作，因為播放開始之前，會延後載入。If a is configured to load a .wav file from a local file path, this method does nothing, because loading is deferred until playing begins. 如需有關非同步載入的詳細資訊，請參閱[如何： 載入音效以非同步方式在 Windows 表單](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-load-a-sound-asynchronously-within-a-windows-form.md)。For more information about asynchronous loading, see [How to: Load a Sound Asynchronously within a Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-load-a-sound-asynchronously-within-a-windows-form.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法以非同步方式的執行個體所載入.wav 檔，用於類別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to asynchronously load a .wav file for use by an instance of the class. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event LoadCompleted As AsyncCompletedEventHandler

summary.span: 當.wav 檔載入成功或載入失敗時都會發生。

span.span: Occurs when a .wav file has been successfully or unsuccessfully loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 載入.wav 檔的完成時，會引發此事件。This event is raised when loading of a .wav file is complete. 事件引數表示的聲音負載已成功完成或失敗。The event arguments indicate whether the load of the sound was completed successfully or failed. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用事件處理常式，以接收通知，指出已載入.wav 檔的內容。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event handler to receive a notification indicating that the contents of a .wav file have been loaded. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#8)]

summary.span: 取得或設定時間，以毫秒為單位，表示 .wav 檔載入所須的時間。

span.span: Gets or sets the time, in milliseconds, in which the .wav file must load.
The number of milliseconds to wait.
The default is 10000 (10 seconds).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此時間到期之後，已取消載入和擲回例外狀況。After this time has expired, the loading is canceled and a exception is thrown.

summary.span: 引發 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 載入.wav 檔的完成時，會呼叫這個方法。This method is called when loading of a .wav file is complete. 引發事件會透過委派叫用此事件處理常式。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法也允許衍生類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 這是在衍生類別中處理事件的慣用技巧。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫 時，請確定呼叫基底類別的 方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Play() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使用新執行緒播放 .wav 檔，如果 .wav 檔還未載入則先將其載入。

span.span: Plays the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法播放聲音使用新的執行緒。The method plays the sound using a new thread. 如果您呼叫之前就會開始播放.wav 檔載入記憶體前，將載入.wav 檔。If you call before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts. 您可以使用或方法，以預先載入.wav 檔的記憶體。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 之後.wav 檔案已成功載入來源或 URL，後續的呼叫，以播放方法不需要重新載入.wav 檔音效變更路徑之前。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果尚未指定.wav 檔，或無法載入，方法會播放預設的嗶聲音效。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用方法以非同步方式播放.wav 檔。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to asynchronously play a .wav file. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#5)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#5)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PlayLooping() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 使用新執行緒重複循環播放 .wav 檔，如果 .wav 檔還未載入則先將其載入。

span.span: Plays and loops the .wav file using a new thread, and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法播放，並執行迴圈使用新執行緒的音效。The method plays and loops the sound using a new thread. 如果您呼叫之前就會開始播放.wav 檔載入記憶體前，將載入.wav 檔。If you call before the .wav file has been loaded into memory, the .wav file will be loaded before playback starts. 您可以使用或方法，以預先載入.wav 檔的記憶體。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 之後.wav 檔案已成功載入來源或 URL，後續的呼叫，以播放方法不需要重新載入.wav 檔音效變更路徑之前。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果尚未指定.wav 檔，或無法載入，方法會播放預設的嗶聲音效。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 如何： 循環播放 Windows Form 上播放的音效](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-loop-a-sound-playing-on-a-windows-form.md)。For more information about , see [How to: Loop a Sound Playing on a Windows Form](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-loop-a-sound-playing-on-a-windows-form.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用重複播放.wav 檔的方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to repeatedly play a .wav file. 直到播放.wav呼叫方法。The .wav will be played until the method is called. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#6)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#6)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#6)]

exception.span: 載入時耗用的時間超過了 所指定的時間 (以毫秒為單位)。

span.span: The elapsed time during loading exceeds the time, in milliseconds, specified by .

exception.span: 找不到 指定的檔案。

span.span: The .wav header is corrupted; the file specified by is not a PCM .wav file.

SoundPlayer Class Overview (Windows Forms)

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PlaySync() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 播放 .wav 檔案，如果 .wav 檔案還未載入則先將其載入。

span.span: Plays the .wav file and loads the .wav file first if it has not been loaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會使用目前的執行緒播放.wav 檔，以防該執行緒處理其他訊息，直到載入完成為止。The method uses the current thread to play a .wav file, preventing the thread from handling other messages until the load is complete. 您可以使用或方法，以預先載入.wav 檔的記憶體。You can use the or method to load the .wav file to memory in advance. 之後.wav 檔案已成功載入來源或 URL，後續的呼叫，以播放方法不需要重新載入.wav 檔音效變更路徑之前。After a .wav file is successfully loaded from a or URL, future calls to playback methods for the will not need to reload the .wav file until the path for the sound changes. 如果尚未指定.wav 檔，或無法載入，方法會播放預設的嗶聲音效。If the .wav file has not been specified or it fails to load, the method will play the default beep sound. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範使用同步播放.wav 檔的方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method to synchronously play a .wav file. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/CPP/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/CS/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.PlaySync/VB/system.windows.forms.sound.playasync.vb#1)]

summary.span: 當這個 的新音效來源路徑設定後即會發生。

span.span: Occurs when a new audio source path for this has been set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發這個事件是當新的音效來源路徑這個已設定。This event is raised when a new audio source path for this has been set. 如需如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about how to handle events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用收到通知的事件處理常式時已附加至不同的.wav 檔。The following code example demonstrates the use of the event handler to receive a notification when the has been attached to a different .wav file. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CPP/soundtestform.cpp#9)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/CS/soundtestform.cs#9)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.Sound#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.Sound/VB/soundtestform.vb#9)]
